column4: GM says will not use 'over-the-air' upgrades on safety systems
column5: LAS VEGAS General Motors Co  will not use 'over-the-air' upgrades  a way of remotely updating software on its vehicles  for safety-critical vehicle systems such as brakes  the automaker's product development chief said on Wednesday  signaling a different approach from electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc .

column4: UPDATE 1-GM says will not use 'over-the-air' upgrades on safety systems
column5: LAS VEGAS  Jan 6 General Motors Co will not use 'over-the-air' upgrades  a way of remotely updating software on its vehicles  for safety-critical vehicle systems such as brakes  the automaker's product development chief said on Wednesday  signaling a different approach from electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc.
